regen.absent_element: situation when default settings resume after manual change ends
regen.new_specification: At the end of a manually set period, the system shall automatically revert the state of the power switch to the default setting and notify the user of the change.
The system shall allow for dynamic adjustment of default settings in response to user preferences or external conditions.

regen.absent_element: notification to user at the end of manual override period
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user when the appliance switches back to the default setting after a manual override period ends.

label: When a manual set state of power ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: revert to the default setting after the manual set state ends
